name: Final Project (CccrizzZ, theKeyboardist)
description:
You start the game from the title screen that will take you to the Overworld, where you will be able to explore the level and find yourself a fight.

Walk around the world with your WASD key and wait until you get an encounter (you have to be on the grass)

in the encounter, you will have your pokemon to fight with a random creature. Use your creature abilities smart and it will bring you to victory. A successful battle gives your pokemon a  random ability (one of the two ones). Win another battle to gain the second one.

After the battle is over, the game brings you back to the overworld.

Dev log:

- created overworld 

- added encounter mechanism

- added background and combat music
